measure.CatchLine: Prohibits certain dwellings in sensitive or unsuitable areas within resource lands.
measure.MeasureSummary:
Digest: This Act bans homes not for farm or forest uses in sensitive or unsuitable areas of lands zoned for farm or forest use. (Flesch Readability Score: 65.7). 
	Prohibits certain dwellings in sensitive or unsuitable areas within resource lands.
measure.RelatingToFull: Relating to the regulation of dwellings on resource lands; creating new provisions; and amending ORS 215.417 and 215.705.
measure.RelatingTo: Relating to the regulation of dwellings on resource lands.
measure.AtTheRequestOf: (at the request of Senate Interim Committee on Natural Resources and Wildfire)
measure.FiscalImpact: May have fiscal impact, but no statement yet issued

sponsors.PresessionFiledMessage: Printed pursuant to Senate Interim Rule 213.28 by order of the President of the Senate in conformance with presession filing rules, indicating neither advocacy nor opposition on the part of the President.

historyActions.ActionText: Introduction and first reading. Referred to President's desk.
Referred to Natural Resources and Wildfire.
